blocks.name: nalfal
blocks.content: Not all sets hold ` F. ` as true. (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 13-Sep-2011.)

blocks.name: nexntru
blocks.content: There does not exist a set such that ` T. ` is not true. (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 13-Sep-2011.)

blocks.name: nexfal
blocks.content: There does not exist a set such that ` F. ` is true. (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 13-Sep-2011.)

blocks.name: neufal
blocks.content: There does not exist exactly one set such that ` F. ` is true. (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 13-Sep-2011.)

blocks.name: neutru
blocks.content: There does not exist exactly one set such that ` T. ` is true. (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 13-Sep-2011.)

blocks.name: nmotru
blocks.content: There does not exist at most one set such that ` T. ` is true. (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 13-Sep-2011.)

blocks.name: mofal
blocks.content: There exist at most one set such that ` F. ` is true. (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 13-Sep-2011.)
